chunk:
Probulin Probiotic Facial Serum, Unscented

Brand: Probulin

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER, LACTOCOCCUS FERMENT LYSATE, GLYCERIN, VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT/LEAF EXTRACT, SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM (SUGAR CANE) EXTRACT, ACER SACCHARUM (SUGAR MAPLE) EXTRACT, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) FRUIT EXTRACT, CITRUS LIMON (LEMON) FRUIT EXTRACT, GLUCOSE, LACTOBACILLUS, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) FRUIT EXTRACT, DEHYDROXANTHAN GUM,

(SUGAR MAPLE) EXTRACT, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) FRUIT EXTRACT, CITRUS LIMON (LEMON) FRUIT EXTRACT, GLUCOSE, LACTOBACILLUS, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) FRUIT EXTRACT, DEHYDROXANTHAN GUM, ORGANIC ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, LYSOLECITHIN, SCLEROTIUM GUM, XANTHAN GUM, PULLULAN, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, LACTOPEROXIDASE, GLUCOSE OXIDASE
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
